| HistoryText             = The Psycho-Cops were a band of deranged pleasure killers who modified conventional paintguns and fired ball bearings instead of paintballs. They all came from different walks of life and picked paintball fields at random, without anything to connect them, save for the joy of the kill. They were all hunted and eliminated by the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]].{{r|Punisher Summer Special Vol 1 #3}}
